source_objects.title: Leadership
source_objects.description: Learn how to lead and influence others with charisma, power, vision, intelligence, theories and more.

items.headline: Getting your points across as a healthcare administrator

Develop a plan for effective communication as a healthcare leader
Use persuasion as an effective communication strategy as a healthcare leader

items.title: Effective Feedback to Shine at Work and in Life
items.headline: Learn how to give and receive feedback
objectives_summary: How to Give and Receive Feedback in an Effective Way

items.title: Agile Leadership
items.headline: Leading in the Age of Constant Change
objectives_summary: The student will learn why agile leadership is central to effective leadership in today’s era of constant change.
The student will learn values, skills and practices of Agile Leadership by exploring the three dimensions and nine themes of the Agile Leader.
The student will learn to challenge his/her own leadership abilities in order to improve.

items.title: Effective Preaching and Teaching
items.headline: How to craft and deliver engaging and life-changing Bible studies and sermons.
objectives_summary: Isolate the main idea of a Bible passage, select a message type, and then craft and deliver an effective Bible message.

items.headline: Beginners Guide To Team Building / Culture Change / Team Respect & Safety / Team Leader Development / Customer Care
objectives_summary: In this course you will learn how to manage culture change as a Team Leader.
You will learn how culture is created and managed in a team in the first course.
You will learn how to create a culture of team respect in the second course.

items.title: Six Tools To Improve Your Tech Leadership & Communication

objectives_summary: How to avoid toxic forms of communication
How to forge alignment and avoid the dangers of consensus and groupthink
Force-field analysis: a great tool for making complex decisions

items.headline: You can't control other people, you can only control how you respond to them.
objectives_summary: Prevent Problems & Change Yourself
How to Manage Anger

items.title: Crisis Leadership Skills -Smart Thinking for Times of Crisis

visible_instructors.name: Ross
visible_instructors.job_title: Ex Crisis Negotiator / Developing Your Effect and Influence
visible_instructors.title: Ross Hardy

items.headline: Crisis Management- Learn to Lead Yourself, Team, & Organisation Through Times of Crisis & Crisis Proof For the Future
objectives_summary: You will learn how to lead yourself well during an organisational crisis, to deescalate negative emotions and engage your smart thinking
Utilising crisis negotiation techniques, you will learn how to lead your team well during a crisis by deescalating their negative emotions and engaging their smart thinking when under pressure
You will learn how to crisis proof and crisis prepare your organisation to make it stronger, more effective, and resilient during a crisis

items.headline: NLP : Discover how to leverage the power and tools of NLP Neuro-linguistic programming to be a better leader or manager
objectives_summary: Discover What  an effective leader is so that you can create goals and objectives to strive for.

Discover what NLP is and how it can help your organisation, team or managers to be more effective
